TopicTitle: Has anyone made it all the way through in Career Mode?

Articles.Content: I am just curios if any player here has made it through the entire science tree on console? I am on PS4 and I would love to know.
previous port yes, took a while, current version since buying of part in R&D is broken I've not bothered to put the time in

Not in career mode, but I'm pretty close in Science Mode.

To get around the game forgetting which nodes you have just unlocked when you have spent Science Points, I've found a workaround.

Enter the R&D building and spend the points, exit and then immediately re-enter.  That way the game seems to update the available parts properly.
Close. Hit the time warp bug.

Yeah I've almost unlocked the entire tech tree. 

Tbh it took me ages to get this far on the old port.

It's been quite refreshing starting a new career with more knowledge this time around.
